articles.title: Australian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Australian Delegation Here 
   Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Australia led by Peter Baxter, first assistant secretary for the North Asia Division of the department, arrived here Sunday.
